document.full_text: zach randolph had 31 points and 11 rebounds, helping the memphis grizzlies make nba history by knocking off the top-seeded san antonio spurs on friday night.
document.title: grizzlies 99, spurs 91: grizzlies beat spurs for first series victory
lines_and_colors: zach randolph had 31 points and 11 rebounds, helping the memphis grizzlies make nba history by knocking off the top-seeded san antonio spurs on friday night.
